Class AbstractBusyLayerUI

                      org.divxdede.swing.busy.ui.AbstractBusyLayerUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, Serializable, EventListener, BusyLayerUI
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicBusyLayerUI
public abstract class AbstractBusyLayerUI
extends LockableUI
implements BusyLayerUI

Abstract implementation of BusyLayerUI.

This implementation subclass LockableUI for protecting the view across any access during the busy state.

setBusyModel and getBusyModel are provided with default implementation that use the final updateUI method.

You must override updateUIImpl method for complete the layer update when needed. This method is called for any changes on the model or ui.

Author:
André Sébastien (divxdede)
See Also:

shouldLock

protected boolean shouldLock()
Indicate if this layer should be placed in a locked state. This default implementation lock the layer when the model is busy.
